cs.RO, cs.HC, cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses a method for hand guidance of robots, which falls under the category of robotics (cs.RO). The use of the Microsoft HoloLens also suggests a human-computer interaction (cs.HC) aspect to the work. The paper also mentions the use of registration algorithms and spatial mesh, which are common in computer vision (cs.CV) and computer graphics (cs.GR) research. Finally, the paper discusses the potential for the method to be used in industrial automation, which falls under the category of control systems (cs.SY).
